attributes.action: CANCEL /CLAW BACK THE BANK BONUSES AND PENSIONS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir,
Please place on the agenda for action a Bill to demand repayment of the excessive Bonus Payments made to the Bank Management of those bailed out by the UK taxpayer
Additionally please action a Bill to reduce the excessive Pension payout of those same Bank Management
